ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 5 Apr 2000, Adam Wasserman wrote:

> That was my belief also, but when I looked through the item lists I have, I
> was unable to find all of the awesome piercers I expected.
>
> The best I could find was the Serated Bone Dirk (8 dam, 27 delay, procs
> engulfing darkness) I'm not sure how much damage the engulfing darkness
> does, but stat wise the EBW is better. So basically what I need are some
> examples of awesome rogue piercers that he should be using instead of MY
> EBW. : )

The other thing is that there are so few rogues, when a higher
level rogue weapon drops, usually the only rogue there gets it
by default (this is especially true in the planes). The EBW
is no-drop, so you're best off giving it to the person who'll
use it the longest. That's more likely to be a bard due to
the current broken-ness of Hate (ranger and warrior weapons
drop pretty frequently in Fear).
